resource.name: Michigan Public Boating Access Sites
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset '2000_Block_Groups' (pfwh-q6f7) the point in column 'location_1' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: Michigan DoT
columns_name: 2012 Year the AADT value was collected
columns_description: Agency responcible for collecting traffic data
2012 Year the AADT value was collected
DTMB  created a global agency look up file in Oracle .  Each agency has been assigned a unique ID.  Agency defined as city, village, county, MPO, RPA, MDOT Region etc.
NHS- national highway system, SAMPLE- HPMS sample segment, NONSAMPLE- full extent segment, PA- principal arterial, anything other than these four is a typo
AADT Year Year traffic count was collected
